entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Coronach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronach 10:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: NW 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
